description: SKY SOLUTIONS sells this wonderful opportunity to acquire a spacious two-story villa located in the sought-after urbanization of Montehermoso, in Campo Real. With a privileged location and a modern design, this property is ideal for those looking for a comfortable and elegant home in a quiet environment. Low level: •Large dining room ideal for entertaining family and friends. •Fully equipped kitchen with high quality finishes. •Full bathroom. • Bedroom 1. •Bedroom 2 with bathroom en suite. •Large garage space. •Stay under the stairs, offering additional storage space. Upper floor: • Master bedroom with dressing room and closet en suite, providing space and privacy. •Two additional bedrooms, perfect for family or guests. •Bathroom with shower, providing comfort and functionality. •Large living room that offers additional space for entertainment and relaxation. Exteriors: • Well-kept garden that surrounds the property, with a wide variety of features: *Playhouse, ideal for the smallest members of the family. *Cookhouse, offering a separate space to prepare delicious meals outdoors. *Space with a gazebo, perfect for enjoying outdoor meals and social gatherings. * Barbecue area, for barbecue lovers. *Pool, where you can cool off and enjoy relaxing moments under the sun. *Seven olive, pine and pomegranate trees, among other trees, that provide beauty and a natural environment to the property. Qualities: High-quality stoneware flooring in the home, Bathrooms and kitchen with large-format ceramic tiles, Individual natural gas heating and hot water through a mixed boiler with a storage tank for hot water, heat distribution through underfloor heating, air conditioning, etcDuring the visit we will expand the information. Location: •Campo Real, a strategic location that provides access to all the necessary amenities, such as supermarkets, schools, restaurants and medical services. •Excellent connection with the rest of the city thanks to its proximity to main roads. Don't miss the opportunity to visit this charming chalet and discover all it has to offer! Garden, gazebo, swimming pool views: The first visit will be made online where we will resolve the first questions you have. If you have more questions or need additional information, do not hesitate to contact me.

Detached villa of 600 m2 with a plot of 1,180 m2 INDEPENDENT luxury villa, 1,180 m2 plot, 5 bathrooms, 6 bedrooms, wine cellar and private pool. Do you want to live in a luxury urbanization, in a movie-like independent house just a few minutes from Madrid? A few kilometers from Arganda del Rey and Rivas Vaciamadrid, in the EXCLUSIVE MONTEHERMOSO Urbanization, with the R3 next door that allows you to reach Madrid O'Donnell in 15 minutes, VIVA HOME offers the house of your dreams for sale. Its spectacular garden designed by professionals stands out for its overflowing pool with waterfalls, built-in jacuzzi with waterfall, terrariums, flowers, ponds, natural grass..., words cannot describe the feeling you have when you enter that wonderful environment. The home is ideal for celebrating events and parties on summer nights due to its spectacular lighting and exquisite design. The chalet is distributed in a very comfortable way for the whole family: -5 spacious rooms with colonial atmosphere decoration.All with large built-in wardrobes.The main room with glass and security blinds, as well as a dressing room and shower area with water sprinklers. -6 bathrooms. -Living room of 46 m2 and 8 m high with an opening staircase open from above, very illuminated thanks to its huge windows distributed throughout the room, with a colonial decoration and has 8 different types of natural stone and wood.The large fireplace in the living room keeps the entire room warm on winter days. -Wine cellar for up to 300 bottles, with water waterfall and indirect lighting. -Ground floor equipped as a 52 m2 inn with natural stones and fireplace, ideal for spending magnificent gatherings with friends or family. -Under the convertible attic roof there is a cinema room, multimedia equipment with a 4 m screen. - Large fully equipped kitchen with island lighting with indirect lights in footlights -Living area, terrace with porch leading to the garden. -26 m2 independent apartment in the basement for service. -67 m2 garage for 3 cars. -2 bar counters. -Overflowing pool with waterfall, 14 m/l massage jets and tropical wood on the beach Hot saline water pool, spas and chromotherapy. -700 m2 designer garden, with natural grass and exemplary plants and trees.Perimeter hedge.With exterior garden and pool lighting and automated pond waterfalls with remote control.Automated irrigation 20 stations.2 tropical areas with fish ponds and waterfalls.Overflowing pool with 14 m/l street and tropical wood on the beach, 4 laminar waterfalls 90 cm and overflowing waterfall on the pool wall with massage jets, Spa with independent water and air pumps and LED lighting.Separate area with barbecue. ADDITIONAL FEATURES -Multimedia centralization throughout the house -Independent internet computer system throughout the house -Complete interior alarm with 6 sensors -4 armored doors -Heat pump for pool and spa heating -Underfloor heating with heat and cold pump throughout the house -Split hot/cold air conditioning in all rooms -Outdoor lighting for garden, pool, waterfalls and automated ponds with remote control -Perimeter alarm throughout the garden -Different types of waterfalls and water games in the pool The house of your dreams, at an extraordinary price a few kilometers from Madrid, do not let it escape into a fantasy If you can afford it, come visit it, you will fall in love. In VIVAHOME you have: Guided visits. We help you manage your purchase. We review and draft your contracts.

description: Do you want to buy a 3-bedroom apartment for sale in Campo Real? Excellent opportunity to own this residential apartment with an area of 81.2m², well distributed in 3 bedrooms and 1 bathroom located in the town of Campo Real, province of Madrid. Would you like more information? Do not hesitate to contact us. Visit without commitment, without commissions of intermediation. More information by filling in the contact form or by phone. We will be happy to assist you. Hipoges is a real estate platform where you can access thousands of real estate assets of different types such as homes, commercial premises, land, new construction, both for individuals and for investors. Hipoges has a wide portfolio of real estate assets in Spain, Portugal and Greece.

Residential building in Campo Real. 30 minutes from Madrid. Town where you can enjoy nature and tranquility. AC HOME presents a fantastic new construction housing development "ARENAL 2" just 30 minutes from Madrid Capital. Private residential complex with top quality facilities that offers 24 exclusive homes with 1,2 and 3 bedrooms, all with Garage and Storage Room included in the price. Homes cared for in detail that incorporate the best qualities: PVC exterior carpentry with thermal bridge breakage with tilt-and-turn opening and double "Climalit" glass, Armored entrance door, built-in wardrobes in all bedrooms, kitchens furnished and equipped with oven, hob and extractor hood, Pre-installation for charging electric cars in garages. Comfortable and highly energy efficient interiors, individual gas heating and pre-installation of air conditioning in the living room and master bedroom. An urbanization equipped with complete common areas: children's area for the little ones and swimming pool. Campo Real is perfectly connected by several bus lines (313, 320 and 321), and access by road from the A-3 and R-3. At AC HOME, we are at your disposal to help you in the purchase of your home, we have our own financial department.

description: INMOBILIARIA TAGONIA, sells beautiful semi-detached house in Campo Real. It is distributed in 3 bedrooms (one on the ground floor), 2 bathrooms, living room, separate kitchen, large halls and 50-meter attic, as well as a 40-meter entrance patio with garage and 60-meter rear garden, and a 25 meter terrace in the master bedroom. The garden connects with the common areas of the urbanization with swimming pools and a children's area in 1600 meters. The chalet has numerous improvements such as; Bars throughout the house, air conditioning in the living room with 2 years and in the attic with 1 year since its installation, screen in the bathroom on the lower floor, Junker city gas boiler recently changed, (3 months), new hob and oven (1 year), the garden has artificial grass and pergola gazebo, as well as the garage part is covered. It has public transport buses, 30 minutes from Madrid and a metro station 10 minutes away (Arganda del Rey) and the R·3 that connects Madrid in 15 minutes. Schools, supermarkets, very quiet closed street with no traffic. [IW].

VILLA IN THE SAME VILLAGE OF CAMPO REAL, 30 MINUTES FROM MADRID, READY TO ENTER TO LIVE, AS THE PRICE INCLUDES MOST OF THE FURNITURE.LUXURY QUALITIES, HEATED POOL, COVERED GARAGE, AND SOLAR PANELS. Spacious semi-detached house with 416 m2 registered and 326 m2 of land, 4 bedrooms, 1 office, 1 attic space of 87 m2 currently equipped as a suite, garage, heated pool and barbecue space.The good thing about this property is its comfort, since you have a ground floor, with everything you need to live, including a room, currently used as an office, a second floor with the rest area, with 4 spacious bedrooms, and as extras, the attic, and a basement, where you can even have your own business, or use it as a games room, since it is completely renovated.The location of this chalet is unbeatable, being in the same town of Campo Real, but in a quiet area, with all services nearby, and just 10 minutes from the Arganda metro.In addition, you can enjoy wonderful clear views.The maintenance of this chalet is exquisite, all the updates have been made with top quality materials and energy expenditure is fully optimized, by having solar panels. DISTRIBUTION A spacious hall welcomes us, and on this floor, we find a room, currently used as an office, 1 complete bathroom with shower, kitchen, living room, a large terrace with views of the countryside and a garage with interior access to the house.On the second floor, we have 4 bedrooms, 2 of them with independent terraces, 1 full bathroom, and another en suite.The basement is set up as a beauty business, with 3 independent apartments, a large room, ideal for family gatherings, a machine room, a warehouse, and a full bathroom.This also has access to the rear of the property.Each floor has about 100m2, so you can enjoy a comfortable home, and even have your own integrated but independent business. QUALITIES AND CHARACTERISTICS: All windows are double glazed tilt-and-turn windows.The floors in the bedrooms and living room are parquet, those in the attic suite, bathrooms and kitchen are porcelain, and the floors in the stairs and halls are granite.The blinds in the living room are automated.The paint throughout the house is smooth.On the first and second floors, the heating is with underfloor heating by a diesel boiler, in the attic, Split air conditioning and heat pump, and on the other three floors, air through ducts, taking advantage of the benefit of solar panels.The carriage door to the garage is automatic.The entire exterior has been updated two years ago: heated pool, barbecue space, with sink and state-of-the-art bioclimatic pergola, artificial grass of the highest quality, so it requires minimal maintenance. SERVICES In the same town there is 1 public school, institute and daycare.As well as a Health Center and pharmacies.Sports center and gym and Supermarkets like Save More. TRANSPORT MEANS Buses: Lines 313, 320 and 321, to Loeches, Torrejón, Arganda and Madrid Capital. By car, R3, which is just 5 minutes away by car, and A3, which are very unproblematic roads in terms of traffic jams. Campo Real is a town, a stone's throw from Madrid Capital, well known for its olives, oil and cheeses. LIVES IN THE COUNTRYSIDE, BUT CLOSE TO THE CITY.You will not find a home with the meters that this property has, at the distance from Madrid capital and at this price.This wonderful chalet wins when you see it live.Schedule a visit and feel that this can really be your new and cozy HOME. WE DO NOT CHARGE FEES TO THE BUYER IF YOU NEED FINANCING, WE WILL HELP YOU FOR FREE TO ACHIEVE THE OPERATION.

TAGONIA REAL ESTATE SELLS a 60 m2 apartment, semi-furnished, distributed in 1 bedroom, with built-in wardrobes, 1 full bathroom with shower. Independent kitchen equipped and furnished. Parking space included in the price. The apartment has stoneware floors, PVC windows, oak carpentry, armored door and individual heating by accumulators. The town has all the necessary services, education, health, leisure, shops and public transport. Just 10 minutes from Arganda del Rey where you will find Metro and Hospital del Sur. [IW].

This villa is at Campo Real, Madrid. It is a villa, built in 1998, that has 410 m2 of which 410 m2 are useful and has 6 rooms and 3 bathrooms. Besides, it includes cocina amueblada, exterior, luminoso, armarios empotrados, terraza and cocina equipada.

INMOBILIARIA TAGONIA, sells a 226 m2 semi-detached house, located in one of the best areas of real countryside with 24-hour security in a CLOSED URBANIZATION, good road access, there is an A3 and radial link with services of schools, institutes, hiking areas, sports, on a 420m2 plot. The chalet on the ground floor has a large kitchen with an exit to the garden area, where there is a wooden porch, gazebo type, and a large-capacity pool surrounded by grass and a slate floor for different accesses to the house. Housing on the same floor there is a very spacious living room with a French fireplace, a toilet, a bedroom suite with a full bathroom with a shower, a dressing room and a reading room with a pellet stove, access to a terrace with impressive views. On the upper floor we find three large bedrooms, a full bathroom with a bathtub. It has a closed and automated garage for two cars. The flooring qualities are laminate flooring combined with stoneware in entrances, oil and pellet heating, double glazing, windows with mosquito nets and air conditioning in several rooms. All bedrooms contain built-in wardrobes with oak paneling. It also has a large semi-basement storage room prepared for a wine cellar. [IW].

This impressive chalet has everything one could want, tranquility and views of the countryside, but with all the services at hand. Corner plot 581 m2, and almost 800 m2 of housing. Four-story villa with elevator, 6 bedrooms, 1 office, kitchen, living room, terrace, 6 bathrooms, 1 toilet, gym, games room, wine cellar, indoor heated pool and 200m2 garage. Underfloor heating and ducted air. The isolation is maximum. The floor is granite and the staircase is an exclusive design with a steel railing. The windows are high-density tilt-and-turn windows with home automation. It has a central vacuum system and intercom throughout the house, as well as a video intercom and elevator on all floors. The bedrooms all have built-in wardrobes. Since this chalet is located in the same town, it has all the services within reach, including a Save More, a wide variety of shops, schools, nurseries, a sports center, etc.

IMPRESSIVE INDEPENDENT CHALET, IDEAL FOR A RURAL HOUSE or FAMILY HOME WITH VIEWS OF THE COUNTRYSIDE, just 25 minutes from Madrid, and 10 minutes from the Arganda Metro, in the same town of Campo Real, with all the services at hand, so as not to have to take the car.Currently inhabited by the same builder, who designed it on a whim.Corner plot 581 m2, and almost 800 m2 of housing.Four-story villa with elevator, 6 bedrooms, 1 office, kitchen, living room, terrace, 6 bathrooms, 1 toilet, gym, games room, wine cellar, indoor heated pool and 200m2 garage. QUALITIES AND MATERIALS: Underfloor heating and ducted air.The isolation is maximum.The floor is granite and the staircase is an exclusive design with a steel railing. The windows are high-density tilt-and-turn windows with home automation.It has a central vacuum system and intercom throughout the house, as well as a video intercom and elevator on all floors.The bedrooms all have built-in wardrobes. DISTRIBUTION MAIN FLOOR Access from the street, with a high security door, leads to a large and bright hall, with a welcome closet, which independently organizes the office rooms, toilet, kitchen with pantry, 70 m2 living room, 2 large bedrooms and 2 bathrooms, one of them en suite.On this floor there is a terrace of about 80 m2 that has access to the kitchen, living room, and bedrooms. TOP FLOOR The comfortable and wide staircase, with an exclusive design, shows us the way to the upper floor, where we have three bedrooms, one with an en-suite bathroom, a separate bathroom, and the other two bedrooms with a terrace.In the other wing on the same floor, we find the master suite, an attached room with a dressing room and a bathroom with a shower and sauna space with separate doors, a hydromassage bathtub and a two-bowl sink. SM1 PLANT We have two independent rooms, one as a storage room and the other as a raw room.Also on this floor we have a garage, with direct access to the house, with capacity for more than 6 cars. SM2 PLANT The best kept secret of this magnificent property… a space reserved for leisure, with a large games room, with a bar, kitchen and everything we need to disconnect, next to a fabulous semi-Olympic-sized heated pool, gym and 2 bedrooms bathroom A house with unbeatable conservation, top-quality materials, spacious spaces, the best views of an infinite countryside and just a stone's throw from Madrid.Ready to surprise at the next family celebration? Don't hesitate to arrange a visit now...you will fall in love..

suggestedTexts: {'title': 'Village house in Calle Lope de Vega'}
description: INMOBILIARIA TAGONIA, sells house with land in Campo Real. It has 106 meters, distributed over two floors, it has 4 large bedrooms, living room, kitchen, pantry, 1 bathroom with shower and a toilet. Community area parking and storage room included in the price. Additional plot of 80m2 indivisible. Location: •Campo Real, a strategic location that provides access to all the necessary amenities, such as supermarkets, schools, restaurants and medical services. •Excellent connection with the rest of the city thanks to the proximity to main roads. WE WILL HELP YOU WITH FINANCING, DO NOT HESITATE TO CONSULT US [IW].

WE DO NOT CHARGE FEES TO THE BUYER, DIRECT DEALING WITH THE PROPERTY, TOTAL TRANSPARENCY.TAXES AND EXPENSES NOT INCLUDED. Alfa presents this fantastic semi-detached house in Campo Real with a plot of 360 m2 and a useful area of 177 m2 plus the attic, far from the noise of the city and enjoying nature and fresh air. The chalet has 3 well-distributed floors: - On the ground floor we find a very large hall with a courtesy closet and another small one next to the stairs.A cozy kitchen fully equipped with high and low cabinets of great capacity and in perfect condition with space for a table and chairs, ideal for enjoying delicious breakfasts and meals with the family, has access to the garden with a beautiful porch.A toilet with an exterior window.A large, very bright living-dining room with two different environments and access to a beautiful porch. -We go up to the first floor and find 4 double bedrooms with built-in wardrobes, a bathroom with a shower and the double bedroom en suite with a modern bathroom with a shower and a glazed terrace with beautiful views and incredible sunsets. -Finally, we access the top floor of about 70 m2 and we find an incredible and cozy independent space, an L-shaped living room with side windows with beautiful views and 2 bedrooms, one of them with base cabinets along the wall and each of them with Velux windows and blinds, one of the rooms with a beautiful full bathroom with a shower. We go out to the garden with a beautiful pool surrounded by grass, strategically located so that it gets the sun all day.With a large barbecue near the kitchen exit.And 2 porches where you can enjoy long evenings accompanied by family and friends. In the front we have a large construction shed for a storage area and to store all the garden utensils. Parking inside the plot for 2 cars. A great home with good materials and the best qualities: -Plated floors throughout the house except in the kitchen and hall, which are ceramic.Porcelain bathrooms. -Tilt-and-turn windows with double climalit glass, aluminum blinds and mosquito nets on all windows. -Light oak wood doors. -Smooth walls. -Natural gas heating. -Pre-installation of air conditioning. Imagine enjoying its spacious 237 m2, with a 360m2 plot and the ideal east-west orientation. You will have all the space you have always wanted in a relaxed and quiet environment! Magnificent Villa in Montehermoso Urbanization: A Dream Home in Campo Real. This semi-detached house, located in the prestigious private urbanization Montehermoso, before reaching Campo Real, represents an exceptional opportunity for families seeking a balance between modern comfort and natural beauty.With 24-hour security, children's areas and direct bus services to Madrid, this urbanization offers a quiet and safe life. Unique and Functional Design: -The house, of 156 m², extends over a 406 m² plot, ingeniously taking advantage of the relief of the land. -The ground floor, accessible directly from the street, includes an elegant hall, a guest toilet, a spacious living room with fireplace, and a spacious and well-equipped kitchen with space for a daily dining room. -From the living room and kitchen, you access a large terrace with unobstructed views of the countryside, an idyllic place to enjoy nature. Private Space and Comfort: -The main floor, at garden level, houses 4 comfortable bedrooms.Two of them, the most spacious, face south and have direct access to the garden.The main one has an en-suite bathroom. -An additional full bathroom serves the other bedrooms, ensuring functionality and privacy. -This floor also includes a versatile room, ideal for a second living room, additional bedroom or any other desired use. Quality Finishes: -The bedrooms are equipped with floating flooring, and there is stoneware in the bathrooms and the lower room and the entire access floor. -Built-in wardrobes in bedrooms and common areas offer elegant and practical storage solutions. Charming Exteriors: -The garden, with a design designed for low maintenance, has olive trees, palm trees and artificial grass. -On the street level, there is an exposed concrete pergola, areas of natural grass, varied plantings and an automatic irrigation system, creating an atmosphere of tranquility and beauty. Comfort All Year: -The north-south orientation of the property ensures natural light throughout the day and facilitates efficient air conditioning. -The house is equipped with all water, electricity and gas supplies, including an individual boiler for hot water and heating. -A comprehensive alarm system provides security and peace of mind. Living in Montehermoso: In addition to the security and amenities of the urbanization, its proximity to Campo Real, 35 minutes from Madrid, makes this location an ideal place to live.
